com.hesamian.ring

Class Monomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hesamian.ring.Monomial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Monomial>

    public class Monomial
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Monomial>
    This class handles Monomials. Monomials have a variable name, coefficient and exponent. Note that coefficient and exponent are BigIntegers as we are dealing with BigInteger Rings. Monomials can be in constant form. For example: 1x^0 + constant.
    Since:
    08/30/2016
    Author:
    Seyedamirhossein Hesamian

      • Monomial

        public Monomial(java.math.BigInteger coefficient,
                java.math.BigInteger exponent,
                java.lang.String name)
        This is a basic constructor that initializes Monomial. Monomial contains: coefficient, exponent and variable name.
        Parameters:
        Coefficient - (BigInteger)
        Exponent - (BigInteger)
        Variable - name (String)

      • Monomial

        public Monomial(java.math.BigInteger constant)
        This is constructor initializes special type of Monomial. Let's call it constant Monomial. It is essentially a Monomial that does not have a variable name, with exponent value of zero and coefficient value of 1.
        Parameters:
        Constant - value (BigInteger)

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public java.math.BigInteger evaluate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigInteger> map)
        This is method evaluated a Monomial by brining a respective variable value to the exponent and then multiplying it with coefficient value. This method uses a Map to evaluate a Monomials. If Monomial is constant then method just returns a constant value and no evaluation is done.
        Parameters:
        Map -
        Returns:
        BigInteger

      • getMonomial

        public static Monomial getMonomial(java.lang.String str)
        This method converts a String representation of Monomial to a Monomial object using regular expression. For example: 2x^3 -> coefficient:2, exponent:3, variable name: x.
        Parameters:
        String - representation of Monomial
        Returns:
        Monomial object
